BadgeDetail.Name: Collaboration
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this composite badge has demonstrated that they are able to work effectively with a wide range of other people to complete tasks and achieve shared goals.They bring a positive attitude to work, contribute ideas and suggestions, work to deadlines, and show empathy towards their colleagues.To earn this badge they must have also earned the following badges: Positive Attitude, Teamwork, Working to deadlines & Emotional IQ.

Task.Title: Earn the badges
Task.Body: Earn the following badges:Positive AttitudeTeamworkWorking to deadlinesEmotional IQ
Task.HtmlBody:
Earn the following badges:

  • Positive Attitude
  • Teamwork
  • Working to deadlines
  • Emotional IQ
